name: Dr. Shamsul Alam
review: Extremely professional service. They identified the termite source in my library and treated it without making any mess. Highly recommended!

name: Mrs. Fatema Begum
review: I was struggling with cockroaches in my kitchen for 2 years. One gel treatment from Pest Control Rajshahi fixed it completely.

name: Tanvir Ahmed
review: We use their cleaning services for our branch monthly. The staff is well-trained, polite, and they always arrive on time.
